screens.name: Dashboard (Home)
sections: Hero: Huge Circular Connect Button (Pulse animation)
Footer: Current Config Name & Telegram Channel

technical_instructions.rtl_setup: Ensure I18nManager.forceRTL(true) is called at app entry. Restart required if changing for first time.
technical_instructions.parser_strategy: Create 'utils/vpnParser.js'. Do NOT use heavy node libraries. Implement manual parsing for 'vmess://' (base64 decode -> json), 'vless://' (regex), 'trojan://', 'ss://'.
technical_instructions.ping_test: Simulate ping by using fetch(HEAD) to a target (e.g., google.com) through the proxy if possible, or simple JS timer for simulation if proxy binding isn't available in Expo Go.

universal_guidelines: Always use 'flex-row-reverse' for horizontal lists to support RTL visually if native RTL acts up, but prefer native RTL.
Use 'Vazirmatn' font for all Persian text.
Don't use gradients for text, it's hard to read in RTL scripts sometimes.
All interactive elements must have 'activeOpacity={0.7}' for tactile feedback.
